Full spectrum light levels

  • {{item}}

Infrared and visible light is measured every 0.5 seconds in a 1 second loop. The output of a 1 second loop contains the averages, minimums and maximums of both these two measures taken. Full spectrum light level is the sum of infrared and visible light level at a given moment. Lux level is mathematically calculated using this information.

Visible light {{ivvExpl}}
